name: Shifting Dungeon
description:
Solve interesting puzzles, manipulate Shifting Blocks to your advantage, and be careful not to crush yourself!
The Shifting Dungeon has 40+ rooms to explore, all with an optional star to collect, totaling 80+ unique challenges.



You take control of the robot character, He can strategically blow up nearby blocks by crushing himself, he will then safely rebuild himself again



Use blocks to avoid dangerous lazers!



Break the Shifting Blocks into smaller parts!
